    <span role="heading" aria-level="2">恒流电路设计之三极管恒流电路</span>
    

</a>

            </h1>
            <div class="clear"></div>
            <div class="postBody">
                <div id="cnblogs_post_body" class="blogpost-body cnblogs-markdown">
<p>上次我们讲了<a href="https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s/FibIvXs0opcGPyXoimTidw" target="_blank" rel="noopener nofollow">恒流电路设计之稳压二极管恒流电路</a>，这次我们接着讲三极管恒流电路</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1298558/202502/1298558-20250217191227613-1261089696.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h1 id="仿真与电路分析">仿真与电路分析</h1>
<p>首先还是用LTspice进行仿真</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1298558/202502/1298558-20250217191307083-1268685281.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<p>同样，该电路也不是对所有的负载都能实现"恒流"。</p>
<p>根据仿真结果，可分析出该电路的工作原理：</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p>配置电阻<span class="math inline">\(R_1\)</span>、三极管<span class="math inline">\(Q_1\)</span>和采样电阻<span class="math inline">\(R_2\)</span>会形成一条通路，从而使三极管<span class="math inline">\(Q_1\)</span>导通；配置电阻<span class="math inline">\(R_1\)</span>会限定<span class="math inline">\(I_{b_{Q_1}}\)</span>和<span class="math inline">\(I_{R_2}\)</span>的大小；</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>若<span class="math inline">\(I_{R_2}*R_2&lt;V_{{be}_{th}}\)</span>(<span class="math inline">\(V_{{be}_{th}}\)</span>是<span class="math inline">\(Q_2\)</span>的死区电压)，则<span class="math inline">\(Q_2\)</span>截止；</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>随着负载逐渐减小，<span class="math inline">\(I_{R_L}\)</span>会逐渐增加，<span class="math inline">\(I_{R_2}=I_{R_L}+I_{b_{Q_1}}\)</span>也会逐渐增加；直到<span class="math inline">\(I_{R_2}*R_2&gt;V_{{be}_{th}}\)</span>，<span class="math inline">\(Q_2\)</span>开始导通；</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>当<span class="math inline">\(V_{{be}_{Q_2}}\)</span>趋于稳定后，<span class="math inline">\(Q_2\)</span>的基极、发射极电流均趋于稳定，<span class="math inline">\(I_{R_1}\)</span>、<span class="math inline">\(I_{R_2}\)</span>亦趋于稳定，电路进入恒流模式；</p>
</li>
</ol>
<p>需要注意的是，如果配置电阻<span class="math inline">\(R_1\)</span>过大，导致<span class="math inline">\(I_{b_{Q_1}}\)</span>过小(因为<span class="math inline">\(I_{{R_L}_{max}}=\beta _{1}*I_{b_{Q_1}}\)</span>)，可能会在整个负载变化过程中，<span class="math inline">\(Q_2\)</span>都无法导通；此时的电路结构会类似于稳压二极管恒流电路；</p>
<p>换句话说，要保证<span class="math inline">\(Q_2\)</span>导通，<span class="math inline">\(R_1\)</span>需满足：</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[V_2-I_{b_{Q_1}}R_1-V_{{be}_{Q_1}}&gt;V_{{be}_{th}}\tag{1}
\]</div><p></p><p></p><div class="math display">\[V_{{be}_{th}}=\beta _{Q_1}I_{b_{Q_1}}R_2\tag{2}
\]</div><p></p><p>即：</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[R_1&lt;\frac{V_2-V_{be_{Q_1}}-V_{be_{th}}}{V_{be_{th}}}\beta _{Q_1}R_2\tag{3}
\]</div><p></p><p><strong>使用该电路时需要特别注意<span class="math inline">\(R_1\)</span>的取值。</strong></p>
<p>上面已经提到该电路是要在特定的负载范围内才能实现恒流，接下来我们研究下负载的取值范围。</p>
<p>该电路进入恒流模式时，三极管同样工作在放大区，即<span class="math inline">\(V_c&gt;V_b\)</span>:</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[V_2-I_L*R_L&gt;V_{be_{Q_2}}+V_{be_{Q_1}}=(I_{e_{Q_1}}-I_{b_{Q_2}})*R_2+V_{be_{Q_1}}\tag{4}
\]</div><p></p><p>假设<span class="math inline">\(I_{b_{Q_2}}\ll I_{e_{Q_1}}\)</span>；同时<span class="math inline">\(I_e\approx I_L\)</span>；所以式(4)可简化为：</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[R_L&lt;\frac{V_2-V_{be_{Q_1}}-V_{be_{Q_2}}}{V_{be_{Q_2}}}R_2\tag{5}
\]</div><p></p><p>最后还有一个关键参数，就是恒流电流为：</p>
<p></p><div class="math display">\[I=\frac{V_{be_{Q_2}}}{R_2}+I_{b_{Q_2}}\tag{6}
\]</div><p></p><h1 id="特点">特点</h1>
<h2 id="缺点">缺点</h2>
<h3 id="1恒流精度差">1、恒流精度差</h3>
<p>根据式(6)，该电路的恒定电流会随三极管的<span class="math inline">\(V_{be}\)</span>的变化而变化；而三极管的<span class="math inline">\(V_{be}\)</span>的温度特性一般较差，对于锗管来说，其<span class="math inline">\(V_{be}\)</span>在-20℃~55℃范围内波动将达到30%以上。</p>
<p>另外在常温(25℃)场景下，三极管的<span class="math inline">\(V_{be}\)</span>也会受基极电流影响，而基极电流会受外围偏置电路影响。基极电流与<span class="math inline">\(V_{be}\)</span>的关系(输入特性曲线)通常在三极管的datasheet中有说明。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1298558/202502/1298558-20250217191450135-1287894193.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h3 id="2三极管的功耗较高">2、三极管<span class="math inline">\(Q_1\)</span>的功耗较高</h3>
<p>当采样电阻<span class="math inline">\(R_2=2 \Omega\)</span>时，<span class="math inline">\(Q_1\)</span>的功耗最高将达到0.9W。</p>
<p><img src="https://img2024.cnblogs.com/blog/1298558/202502/1298558-20250217191442177-779186042.png" alt="" loading="lazy"></p>
<h2 id="优点">优点</h2>
<ol>
<li>
<p>三极管恒流电路没有用到特殊器件，仅由两个三极管和几个电阻组成，成本低，输出电流可调。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>三极管恒流电路的工作原理本质上还是与稳压二极管恒流电路相似，但其恒流区的负载范围会比稳压二极管恒流电路更大，所以三极管恒流电路适用性更强。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>三极管恒流电路只有一个高功率器件(<span class="math inline">\(Q_1\)</span>)，在相同的恒定电流状态下，其功耗会比稳压二极管恒流电路更小。</p>
</li>
</ol>
<h1 id="总结">总结</h1>
<p>该电路设计时需要特别注意：</p>
<ol>
<li>
<p><span class="math inline">\(R_1\)</span>的取值，取值不合适会导致<span class="math inline">\(Q_2\)</span>无法导通，从而得不到理论的恒定电流。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>该电路仅适用于对恒流精度要求不高的场景。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>该电路仅在一定负载范围内才能实现恒流，使用时，需要考虑负载适用范围。</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>三极管<span class="math inline">\(Q_1\)</span>需要做好散热。</p>
</li>
</ol>
